Location.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="CurrencyTrade">Action Location</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="CurrencyTrade">Action Location</ecoicon>: The position where the interaction took place.

List.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="CurrencyTrade">Buying</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="CurrencyTrade">Buying</ecoicon>: Was the good bought or sold by the initiating player?
